snippet: GELBER--Ady A. The Israel Ministry of Tourism mourns the passing of A. Ady Gelber, longtime CEO and owner of Isram Travel. For close to six decades Ady's career was devoted to building tourism to Israel, and we applaud and treasure the creativity, passion, commitment and vision that led to Isram for many years being America's largest tour operator to our country. Ady's impact on American tourism to Israel will never be forgotten and we extend our deepest sympathy to his children, grandchildren and the worldwide Isramworld family. Uri Steinberg, Israel Tourism Commissioner, North America 1/3
